Sharp display

dev board Adafruit Feather Bluefruit
chip nRF52
features sharp display

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Adafruit nRF52 Arduino
  • Adafruit nRF52 nrfutil
  • Adafruit SHARP memory display firmware

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky nRF52

Buy the components

  1. Adafruit Feather Bluefruit

Code

Download code sharp-display.ino

Makefile

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

Adafruit Bluefruit nRF52 breakout board and Adafruit SHARP Memory Monochrome Display Breakout 168x144 pixels are used.

References

  1. Adafruit SHARP memory display firmware
